title: Create user-settings repository
acceptance_criteria: Generic functions: getUserSetting<T>(userId, key), setUserSetting<T>(userId, key, value), deleteUserSetting(userId, key), getAllUserSettings(userId)

Typed functions: getUserApiKey(userId), setUserApiKey(userId, key), getUserDefaultModel(userId), setUserDefaultModel(userId, model), getUserImageModels(userId), setUserImageModels(userId, models[]), getUserWebhooks(userId), setUserWebhooks(userId, webhooks[]), getWebhookByCategory(userId, category)
WebhookConfig type defined: { id: string, name: string, url: string, categories: string[], isDefault?: boolean }
